mapper.select: SELECT seq, bef_cont, aft_cont, appl_time, comt, reg_date, reg_user_seq, up_date, up_user_seq, cno, bno FROM comment_change_history WHERE seq = #{seq}
SELECT seq, bef_cont, aft_cont, appl_time, comt, reg_date, reg_user_seq, up_date, up_user_seq, cno, bno FROM comment_change_history WHERE cno = #{cno}

SELECT c1.seq AS seq, c1.bef_cont AS bef_cont, c1.aft_cont AS aft_cont, c1.appl_time AS appl_time, c1.comt AS comt, c1.reg_date AS reg_date, c1.reg_user_seq AS reg_user_seq, c1.up_date AS up_date, c1.up_user_seq AS up_user_seq, c1.cno AS cno, c1.bno AS bno FROM comment_change_history AS c1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(seq) AS seq FROM comment_change_history WHERE cno = #{cno} ) AS c2 ON c1.seq = c2.seq
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment_change_history ( bef_cont, aft_cont, appl_time, comt, reg_date, reg_user_seq, up_date, up_user_seq, cno, bno ) VALUES ( #{bef_cont}, #{aft_cont}, #{appl_time}, #{comt}, #{reg_date}, #{reg_user_seq}, #{up_date}, #{up_user_seq}, #{cno}, #{bno} )
mapper.update: UPDATE comment_change_history SET bef_cont = #{bef_cont}, aft_cont = #{aft_cont}, appl_time = #{appl_time}, comt = #{comt}, reg_date = #{reg_date}, reg_user_seq = #{reg_user_seq}, up_date = #{up_date}, up_user_seq = #{up_user_seq}, cno = #{cno}, bno = #{bno} WHERE seq = #{seq}
